movies.title: The Age of Adaline
movies.plot: After 29-year-old Adaline recovers from a nearly lethal accident, she inexplicably stops growing older. As the years stretch on and on, Adaline keeps her secret to herself  until she meets a man who changes her life.

events.title: a young engineer displays uncommon gallantry
Adeline Marries Clarence James Prescott at Old St. Mary's cathedral in San Francisco
eight workers and two engineers lose their lives when a section of scaffolding falls through a safety net during construction of the Golden Gate Bridge
a taxi cab travels through San Francisco, from Chinatown to Marin

movies.title: Stronger
movies.plot: A victim of the Boston Marathon bombing in 2013 helps the police track down the killers while struggling to recover from devastating trauma.

events.title: Jeff Bauman loses his legs in the Boston Marathon bombing

movies.title: Winchester
movies.plot: San Jose, California, 1906. Isolated in her labyrinthine mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester believes that she is being haunted by the souls of those killed by the guns manufactured by her company.

events.title: Ted Kennedy crashes his car, killing his passenger Mary Jo Kopechne
after crashing his car, Ted Kennedy flees the scene

movies.title: Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot
movies.plot: On the rocky path to sobriety after a life-changing accident, John Callahan discovers the healing power of art, willing his injured hands into drawing hilarious, often controversial cartoons, which bring him a new lease on life.

events.title: John Callahan is paralysed in a car crash

movies.title: Wonder
movies.plot: The story of August Pullman – a boy with facial differences – who enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 26 nominations.

movies.title: Knives Out
movies.plot: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 45 wins & 93 nominations.

movies.title: Beyond the Sea
movies.plot: Based on the life and career of legendary entertainer, Bobby Darin, the biopic moves back and forth between his childhood and adulthood, to tell the tale of his life.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 nominations.
